Text: Thanks very much, HuHtEr. For noobs follow this.Install, either with program included in torrent or go to yamicsoft and download there.  Install, make sure you don't run the program after install. In the install directory, under program files, locate yamicsoft, block the live update.exe and update copy.exe and windows 7 manager.exe with firewall. then run the program click on register and buy. If you have sand-boxie then right-click on the Keygen and send-to Sandboxie. If you don't have sandboxie, they offer a free version, The keygen will then run sand-boxed. Don't hit patch, just copy and past serial.  That's it, This is what I did and it works for me.  you'll notice there are quite a few exe. that you could block in the yamicsoft folder,  but I found you only need to block the three I mentioned. Virus Total say's the keygen is a virus/risk ware. Nevermind it and run sandboxed. Hope this helps.Peace
